EmailTemplate.name: Insurance Contact (1342030522.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Insurance Contact (1342030522.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jim, Below is the contact information for a good insurance broker. I have copied him on this email to let him know you may be contacting him: Michael Cronin, CLCS Account Executive, Commercial Lines
THE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, INC. <http://www.tie-inc.com/doc.asp?id=9> 9713 Key West Ave., Suite #401 Rockville, MD 20850(800)346-1403 (toll free) (301)545-1579 (direct) (301)330-1270 (fax) Cronin.M@Tie-Inc.com <mailto:Cronin.M@Tie-Inc.com> Have a great day!Nicolette From: Jim Rayburn [mailto:jim@icmatoday.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2012 10:27 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up Nicolette – for today’s telecon at 11AM MDT, would you please call my cell (520) 954-1587.Thanks.Jim From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Monday, July 09, 2012 1:55 PM To: jim@icmatoday.com <mailto:jim@icmatoday.com> Subject: FW: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Jim, I received your voicemail from Friday, and I apologize for the delay in getting back to you today. I will not have any time to speak today, but would you have some time tomorrow to speak? Please see my email below that has a link to my calendar for you to see what times are available. I look forward to speaking with you soon! Nicolette From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Friday, July 06, 2012 5:36 PM To: 'jim@icmatoday.com' Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up Dear Jim, As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1>. You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette
